text: <@U0546QERR>: I wouldn't be using Java 8 with Kotlin on Android
<@U0546QERR>: Also, I haven't used Hugo with Kotlin yet, so it's possible the weaving it's doing is screwing with things

i can do without either, java8 is for retrolambdas but if i start using kotlin i don't really need that, and he might have a kotlin library for hugo like he has with KotterKnife
